멤버 함수 문서화

◆ fileImportGSACodeFile()

bool MainWnd::fileImportGSACodeFile ( CString &  fileName)

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 724 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

725 {
726  FILE *f = fopen(fileName, "rb");
727 
728  if(f == NULL) {
729  systemMessage(MSG_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, "Cannot open file %s", fileName);
730  return false;
731  }
732 
733  u32 len;
734  fread(&len, 1, 4, f);
735  if(len != 14) {
736  fclose(f);
737  systemMessage(MSG_UNSUPPORTED_CODE_FILE, "Unsupported code file %s",
738  fileName);
739  return false;
740  }
741  char buffer[16];
742  fread(buffer, 1, 14, f);
743  buffer[14] = 0;
744  if(memcmp(buffer, "SharkPortCODES", 14)) {
745  fclose(f);
746  systemMessage(MSG_UNSUPPORTED_CODE_FILE, "Unsupported code file %s",
747  fileName);
748  return false;
749  }
750  fseek(f, 0x1e, SEEK_SET);
751  fread(&len, 1, 4, f);
752  INT_PTR game = 0;
753  if(len > 1) {
754  GSACodeSelect dlg(f);
755  game = dlg.DoModal();
756  }
757  fclose(f);
758 
759  bool v3 = false;
760 
761  int index = fileName.ReverseFind('.');
762 
763  if(index != -1) {
764  if(fileName.Right(3).CompareNoCase("XPC") == 0)
765  v3 = true;
766  }
767 
768  if(game != -1) {
769  return cheatsImportGSACodeFile(fileName, (int)game, v3);
770  }
771 
772  return true;

◆ fileOpenSelect()

bool MainWnd::fileOpenSelect ( bool  gb = false)

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 1033 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

1034 {
1035  theApp.dir = _T("");
1036  CString initialDir;
1037  if( gb ) {
1038  initialDir = regQueryStringValue( _T("gbromdir"), _T(".") );
1039  } else {
1040  initialDir = regQueryStringValue( _T("romdir"), _T(".") );
1041  }
1042 
1043  if( initialDir[0] == '.' ) {
1044  // handle as relative path
1045  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
1046  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
1047  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
1048  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
1049  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
1050  strcat( baseDir, initialDir );
1051  initialDir = baseDir;
1052  }
1053 
1054  if( !initialDir.IsEmpty() ) {
1055  theApp.dir = initialDir;
1056  }
1057 
1058  int selectedFilter = 0;
1059  if( !gb ) {
1060  selectedFilter = regQueryDwordValue( _T("selectedFilter"), 0);
1061  if( (selectedFilter < 0) || (selectedFilter > 2) ) {
1062  selectedFilter = 0;
1063  }
1064  }
1065 
1066  theApp.szFile = _T("");
1067 
1068  LPCTSTR exts[] = { _T(""), _T(""), _T(""), _T("") };
1069  CString filter;
1070  CString title;
1071  if( gb ) {
1072  filter = winLoadFilter( IDS_FILTER_GBROM );
1073  title = winResLoadString( IDS_SELECT_ROM );
1074  } else {
1075  filter = winLoadFilter( IDS_FILTER_ROM );
1076  title = winResLoadString( IDS_SELECT_ROM );
1077  }
1078 
1079  FileDlg dlg( this, _T(""), filter, selectedFilter, _T(""), exts, theApp.dir, title, false);
1080 
1081  if( dlg.DoModal() == IDOK ) {
1082  if( !gb ) {
1083  regSetDwordValue( _T("selectedFilter"), dlg.m_ofn.nFilterIndex );
1084  }
1085  theApp.szFile = dlg.GetPathName();
1086  theApp.dir = theApp.szFile.Left( dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset );
1087  if( (theApp.dir.GetLength() > 3) && (theApp.dir[theApp.dir.GetLength()-1] == _T('\\')) ) {
1088  theApp.dir = theApp.dir.Left( theApp.dir.GetLength() - 1 );
1089  }
1090  SetCurrentDirectory( theApp.dir );
1091  return true;
1092  }
1093  return false;
1094 }

bool MainWnd::FileRun ( )

439 {
440  // save battery file before we change the filename...
441  if(rom != NULL || gbRom != NULL) {
442  if(theApp.autoSaveLoadCheatList)
443  winSaveCheatListDefault();
444  writeBatteryFile();
445  cheatSearchCleanup(&cheatSearchData);
446  theApp.emulator.emuCleanUp();
447  remoteCleanUp();
448  emulating = false;
449  }
450  char tempName[2048];
451  char file[2048];
452 
453  utilGetBaseName(theApp.szFile, tempName);
454 
455  _fullpath(file, tempName, 1024);
456  theApp.filename = file;
457 
458  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('.');
459  if(index != -1)
460  theApp.filename = theApp.filename.Left(index);
461 
462  CString ipsname;
463  ipsname.Format("%s.ips", theApp.filename);
464 
465  if(!theApp.dir.GetLength()) {
466  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
467  if(index != -1) {
468  theApp.dir = theApp.filename.Left(index-1);
469  }
470  }
471 
472  IMAGE_TYPE type = utilFindType(theApp.szFile);
473 
474  if(type == IMAGE_UNKNOWN) {
475  systemMessage(IDS_UNSUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE,
476  "Unsupported file type: %s", theApp.szFile);
477  return false;
478  }
479  systemSaveUpdateCounter = SYSTEM_SAVE_NOT_UPDATED;
480  theApp.cartridgeType = type;
481  if(type == IMAGE_GB) {
482  genericflashcardEnable = theApp.winGenericflashcardEnable;
483 
484 
485  if(!gbLoadRom(theApp.szFile))
486  return false;
487 
488  gbGetHardwareType();
489 
490  // used for the handling of the gb Boot Rom
491  if (gbHardware & 5)
492  {
493  char tempName[2048];
494  GetModuleFileName(NULL, tempName, 2048);
495 
496  char *p = strrchr(tempName, '\\');
497  if(p)
498  *p = 0;
499 
500  strcat(tempName, "\\DMG_ROM.bin");
501 
502  skipBios = theApp.skipBiosFile ? true : false;
503  gbCPUInit(tempName, theApp.useBiosFile ? true : false);
504  }
505 
506 
507 
508  gbReset();
509  theApp.emulator = GBSystem;
510  gbBorderOn = theApp.winGbBorderOn;
511  theApp.romSize = gbRomSize;
512 
513 
514  if(theApp.autoIPS) {
515  int size = gbRomSize;
516  utilApplyIPS(ipsname, &gbRom, &size);
517  if(size != gbRomSize) {
518  extern bool gbUpdateSizes();
519  gbUpdateSizes();
520  gbReset();
521  theApp.romSize = size;
522  }
523  }
524  } else {
525  int size = CPULoadRom(theApp.szFile);
526  if(!size)
527  return false;
528 
529  theApp.romSize = size;
530 
531  flashSetSize(theApp.winFlashSize);
532  rtcEnable(theApp.winRtcEnable);
533  cpuSaveType = theApp.winSaveType;
534 
535  GetModuleFileName(NULL, tempName, 2048);
536 
537  char *p = strrchr(tempName, '\\');
538  if(p)
539  *p = 0;
540 
541  char buffer[5];
542  strncpy(buffer, (const char *)&rom[0xac], 4);
543  buffer[4] = 0;
544 
545  strcat(tempName, "\\vba-over.ini");
546 
547  UINT i = GetPrivateProfileInt(buffer,
548  "rtcEnabled",
549  -1,
550  tempName);
551  if(i != (UINT)-1)
552  rtcEnable(i == 0 ? false : true);
553 
554  i = GetPrivateProfileInt(buffer,
555  "flashSize",
556  -1,
557  tempName);
558  if(i != (UINT)-1 && (i == 0x10000 || i == 0x20000))
559  flashSetSize((int)i);
560 
561  i = GetPrivateProfileInt(buffer,
562  "saveType",
563  -1,
564  tempName);
565  if(i != (UINT)-1 && (i <= 5))
566  cpuSaveType = (int)i;
567  i = GetPrivateProfileInt(buffer,
568  "mirroringEnabled",
569  -1,
570  tempName);
571  if(i != (UINT)-1)
572  doMirroring (i == 0 ? false : true);
573 
574  theApp.emulator = GBASystem;
575  /* disabled due to problems
576  if(theApp.removeIntros && rom != NULL) {
577  *((u32 *)rom)= 0xea00002e;
578  }
579  */
580 
581  if(theApp.autoIPS) {
582  int size = 0x2000000;
583  utilApplyIPS(ipsname, &rom, &size);
584  if(size != 0x2000000) {
585  CPUReset();
586  }
587  }
588  }
589 
590  if(theApp.soundInitialized) {
591  if(theApp.cartridgeType == 1)
592  gbSoundReset();
593  else
594  soundReset();
595  } else {
596  if(!soundOffFlag)
597  soundInit();
598  theApp.soundInitialized = true;
599  }
600 
601  if(type == IMAGE_GBA) {
602  skipBios = theApp.skipBiosFile ? true : false;
603  CPUInit((char *)(LPCTSTR)theApp.biosFileName, theApp.useBiosFile ? true : false);
604  CPUReset();
605  }
606 
607  readBatteryFile();
608 
609  if(theApp.autoSaveLoadCheatList)
610  winLoadCheatListDefault();
611 
612  theApp.addRecentFile(theApp.szFile);
613 
614  theApp.updateWindowSize(theApp.videoOption);
615 
616  theApp.updateFrameSkip();
617 
618  if(theApp.autoHideMenu && theApp.videoOption > VIDEO_4X && theApp.menuToggle)
619  OnFileTogglemenu();
620 
621  emulating = true;
622 
623  if(theApp.autoLoadMostRecent)
624  OnFileLoadgameMostrecent();
625 
626  theApp.frameskipadjust = 0;
627  theApp.renderedFrames = 0;
628  theApp.autoFrameSkipLastTime = theApp.throttleLastTime = systemGetClock();
629 
630  theApp.rewindCount = 0;
631  theApp.rewindCounter = 0;
632  theApp.rewindSaveNeeded = false;
633 
634  return true;
635 }

1208 
1209  bool a = (nState == WA_ACTIVE) || (nState == WA_CLICKACTIVE);
1210 
1211  if(a && theApp.input) {
1212  theApp.active = a;
1213  theApp.input->activate();
1214  if(!theApp.paused) {
1215  if(emulating) {
1216  soundResume();
1217  }

1224  }

1234  systemDrawScreen();
1235  theApp.painting = false;
1236  theApp.renderedFrames--;
1237  }
1238 }

79 {
80  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
81  CString buffer;
82  CString filename;
83 
84  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
85 
86  if(index != -1)
87  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
88  else
89  buffer = theApp.filename;
90 
91  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
92 
93  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
94  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
95 
96  if(isDriveRoot(saveDir))
97  filename.Format("%s%s.clt", saveDir, buffer);
98  else

◆ OnContextMenu()

void MainWnd::OnContextMenu ( CWnd *  pWnd,
CPoint  point 
)
protected

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 972 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

973 {
974  winMouseOn();
975  if(theApp.skin) {
976  if(theApp.popup == NULL) {
977  theApp.winAccelMgr.UpdateMenu(theApp.menu);
978  theApp.popup = CreatePopupMenu();
979  if(theApp.menu != NULL) {
980  int count = GetMenuItemCount(theApp.menu);
981  OSVERSIONINFO info;
982  info.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(info);
983  GetVersionEx(&info);
984 
985  if(info.dwPlatformId == VER_PLATFORM_WIN32_WINDOWS) {
986  for(int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
987  char buffer[256];
988  MENUITEMINFO info;
989  ZeroMemory(&info, sizeof(info));
990  info.cbSize = sizeof(info) - sizeof(HBITMAP);
991  info.fMask = MIIM_STRING | MIIM_SUBMENU;
992  info.dwTypeData = buffer;
993  info.cch = 256;
994  if(!GetMenuItemInfo(theApp.menu, i, MF_BYPOSITION, &info)) {
995  }
996  if(!AppendMenu(theApp.popup, MF_POPUP|MF_STRING, (UINT_PTR)info.hSubMenu, buffer)) {
997  }
998  }
999  } else {
1000  for(int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
1001  wchar_t buffer[256];
1002  MENUITEMINFOW info;
1003  ZeroMemory(&info, sizeof(info));
1004  info.cbSize = sizeof(info) - sizeof(HBITMAP);
1005  info.fMask = MIIM_STRING | MIIM_SUBMENU;
1006  info.dwTypeData = buffer;
1007  info.cch = 256;
1008  if(!GetMenuItemInfoW(theApp.menu, i, MF_BYPOSITION, &info)) {
1009  }
1010  if(!AppendMenuW(theApp.popup, MF_POPUP|MF_STRING, (UINT_PTR)info.hSubMenu, buffer)) {
1011  }
1012  }
1013  }
1014  }
1015  }
1016  int x = point.x;
1017  int y = point.y;
1018  if(x == -1 && y == -1) {
1019  x = (theApp.dest.left + theApp.dest.right) / 2;
1020  y = (theApp.dest.top + theApp.dest.bottom) / 2;
1021  }
1022  if(!TrackPopupMenu(theApp.popup, 0, x, y, 0, m_hWnd, NULL)) {
1023  }
1024  }
1025 }

◆ OnFileExportBatteryfile()

void MainWnd::OnFileExportBatteryfile ( )
protected

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 499 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

500 {
501  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
502  CString name;
503 
504  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
505 
506  if(index != -1)
507  name = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
508  else
509  name = theApp.filename;
510 
511  LPCTSTR exts[] = {".sav", ".dat" };
512 
513  CString filter = winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_SAV);
514  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_BATTERY_FILE);
515 
516  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("batteryDir", NULL);
517  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
518  // handle as relative path
519  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
520  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
521  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
522  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
523  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
524  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
525  saveDir = baseDir;
526  }
527 
528  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
529  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
530 
531  FileDlg dlg(this,
532  name,
533  filter,
534  1,
535  "SAV",
536  exts,
537  saveDir,
538  title,
539  true);
540 
541  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL) {
542  return;
543  }
544 
545  bool result = false;
546 
547  if(theApp.cartridgeType == 1) {
548  result = gbWriteBatteryFile(dlg.GetPathName(), false);
549  } else
550  result = theApp.emulator.emuWriteBattery(dlg.GetPathName());
551 
552  if(!result)
553  systemMessage(MSG_ERROR_CREATING_FILE, "Error creating file %s",
554  dlg.GetPathName());
555 }

◆ OnFileImportBatteryfile()

void MainWnd::OnFileImportBatteryfile ( )
protected

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 382 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

383 {
384  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
385  LPCTSTR exts[] = { ".sav" };
386  CString filter = winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_SAV);
387  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_BATTERY_FILE);
388 
389  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("batteryDir", NULL);
390  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
391  // handle as relative path
392  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
393  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
394  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
395  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
396  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
397  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
398  saveDir = baseDir;
399  }
400 
401  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
402  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
403 
404  FileDlg dlg(this, "", filter, 0, "", exts, saveDir, title, false);
405 
406  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL)
407  return;
408 
409  CString str1 = winResLoadString(IDS_SAVE_WILL_BE_LOST);
410  CString str2 = winResLoadString(IDS_CONFIRM_ACTION);
411 
412  if(MessageBox(str1,
413  str2,
414  MB_OKCANCEL) == IDCANCEL)
415  return;
416 
417  bool res = false;
418 
419  res = theApp.emulator.emuReadBattery(dlg.GetPathName());
420 
421  if(!res)
422  systemMessage(MSG_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, "Cannot open file %s", dlg.GetPathName());
423  else {
424  //Removed the reset to allow loading a battery file 'within' a save state.
425  //theApp.emulator.emuReset();
426  }
427 }
IDS_CONFIRM_ACTION
#define IDS_CONFIRM_ACTION
Definition: resource.h:331

◆ OnFileLoad()

void MainWnd::OnFileLoad ( )
protected

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 176 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

177 {
178  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
179  CString buffer;
180  CString filename;
181 
182  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
183 
184  if(index != -1)
185  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
186  else
187  buffer = theApp.filename;
188 
189  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
190  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
191  // handle as relative path
192  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
193  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
194  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
195  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
196  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
197  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
198  saveDir = baseDir;
199  }
200 
201  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
202  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
203 
204  if(isDriveRoot(saveDir))
205  filename.Format("%s%s.sgm", saveDir, buffer);
206  else
207  filename.Format("%s\\%s.sgm", saveDir, buffer);
208 
209  LPCTSTR exts[] = { ".sgm" };
210  CString filter = winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_SGM);
211  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_SAVE_GAME_NAME);
212 
213  FileDlg dlg(this, filename, filter, 0, "", exts, saveDir, title, false);
214 
215  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
216  bool res = loadSaveGame(dlg.GetPathName());
217 
218  theApp.rewindCount = 0;
219  theApp.rewindCounter = 0;
220  theApp.rewindSaveNeeded = false;
221 
222  if(res)
223  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_LOADED_STATE));
224  }
225 }

void systemScreenMessage(const char *_csMsg)

◆ OnFileLoadgameMostrecent()

void MainWnd::OnFileLoadgameMostrecent ( )
protected

882 {
883  if(!emulating)
884  return;
885 
886  CString filename;
887 
888  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
889 
890  if(index != -1)
891  filename = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
892  else
893  filename = theApp.filename;
894 
895  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
896  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
897  // handle as relative path
898  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
899  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
900  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
901  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
902  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
903  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
904  saveDir = baseDir;
905  }
906 
907  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
908  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
909 
910  if(!isDriveRoot(saveDir))
911  saveDir += "\\";
912 
913  CString name;
914  CFileStatus status;
915  CString str;
916  time_t time = 0;
917  int found = -1;
918 
919  for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
920  name.Format("%s%s%d.sgm", saveDir, filename, i+1);
921 
922  if(emulating && CFile::GetStatus(name, status)) {
923 if(status.m_mtime.GetTime() < time) {
924  time = status.m_mtime.GetTime();
925  found = i;
926  }
927  }
928  }
929  if(found != -1) {
930  OnFileLoadSlot(ID_FILE_LOADGAME_SLOT1+found);
931  }
932 }

237  CString filename;
238

242  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
243  else
244  buffer = theApp.filename;
245 
246  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
247  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
248  // handle as relative path
249  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
250  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
251  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
252  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
253  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
254  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
255  saveDir = baseDir;
256  }
257

282  return res;

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 285 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

286 {
287  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
288  CString buffer;
289  CString filename;
290 
291  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
292 
293  if(index != -1)
294  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
295  else
296  buffer = theApp.filename;
297 
298  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
299  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
300  // handle as relative path
301  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
302  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
303  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
304  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
305  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
306  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
307  saveDir = baseDir;
308  }
309 
310  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
311  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
312 
313  if(isDriveRoot(saveDir))
314  filename.Format("%s%s.sgm", saveDir, buffer);
315  else
316  filename.Format("%s\\%s.sgm", saveDir, buffer);
317 
318  LPCTSTR exts[] = { ".sgm" };
319  CString filter = winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_SGM);
320  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_SAVE_GAME_NAME);
321 
322  FileDlg dlg(this, filename, filter, 0, "", exts, saveDir, title, true);
323 
324  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
325  bool res = writeSaveGame(dlg.GetPathName());
326  if(res)
327  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_WROTE_STATE));
328  }
329 }

◆ OnFileSavegameOldestslot()

void MainWnd::OnFileSavegameOldestslot ( )
protected

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 775 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

776 {
777  if(!emulating)
778  return;
779 
780  CString filename;
781 
782  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
783 
784  if(index != -1)
785  filename = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
786  else
787  filename = theApp.filename;
788 
789  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
790  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
791  // handle as relative path
792  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
793  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
794  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
795  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
796  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
797  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
798  saveDir = baseDir;
799  }
800 
801  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
802  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
803 
804  if(!isDriveRoot(saveDir))
805  saveDir += "\\";
806 
807  CString name;
808  CFileStatus status;
809  CString str;
810  time_t time = (time_t)-1;
811  int found = 0;
812 
813  for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
814  name.Format("%s%s%d.sgm", saveDir, filename, i+1);
815 
816  if(emulating && CFile::GetStatus(name, status)) {
817  if(status.m_mtime.GetTime() < time) {
818  time = status.m_mtime.GetTime();
819  found = i;
820  }
821  } else {
822  found = i;
823  break;
824  }
825  }
826  OnFileSaveSlot(ID_FILE_SAVEGAME_SLOT1+found);
827 }

◆ OnFileSaveSlot()

BOOL MainWnd::OnFileSaveSlot ( UINT  nID)
protected

337 {
338  nID = nID + 1 - ID_FILE_SAVEGAME_SLOT1;
339 
340  CString buffer;
341  CString filename;
342 
343  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
344 
345  if(index != -1)
346  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
347  else

349 
350  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
351  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
352  // handle as relative path
353  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
354  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
355  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
356  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
357  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
358  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
359  saveDir = baseDir;
360  }

373  buffer.Format(format, nID);
374

376

378 
379  return res;
380 }

◆ OnFileScreencapture()

void MainWnd::OnFileScreencapture ( )
protected

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 610 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

611 {
612  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
613  CString name;
614  CString filename;
615 
616  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
617 
618  if(index != -1)
619  name = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
620  else
621  name = theApp.filename;
622 
623  CString capdir = regQueryStringValue("captureDir", "");
624  if( capdir[0] == '.' ) {
625  // handle as relative path
626  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
627  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
628  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
629  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
630  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
631  strcat( baseDir, capdir );
632  capdir = baseDir;
633  }
634  if(capdir.IsEmpty())
635  capdir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
636 
637  CString ext = "png";
638 
639  if(theApp.captureFormat != 0)
640  ext = "bmp";
641 
642  if(isDriveRoot(capdir))
643  filename.Format("%s%s.%s", capdir, name, ext);
644  else
645  filename.Format("%s\\%s.%s", capdir, name, ext);
646 
647  LPCTSTR exts[] = {".png", ".bmp" };
648 
649  CString filter = winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_PNG);
650  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_CAPTURE_NAME);
651 
652  FileDlg dlg(this,
653  filename,
654  filter,
655  theApp.captureFormat ? 2 : 1,
656  theApp.captureFormat ? "BMP" : "PNG",
657  exts,
658  capdir,
659  title,
660  true);
661 
662  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL)
663  return;
664 
665  if(dlg.getFilterIndex() == 2)
666  theApp.emulator.emuWriteBMP(dlg.GetPathName());
667  else
668  theApp.emulator.emuWritePNG(dlg.GetPathName());
669 
670  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_SCREEN_CAPTURE));
671 }
systemScreenMessage
void systemScreenMessage(const char *_csMsg)

◆ OnInitMenuPopup()

void MainWnd::OnInitMenuPopup ( CMenu *  pPopupMenu,
UINT  nIndex,
BOOL  bSysMenu 
)
protected

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 637 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

638 {
639  ASSERT(pMenu != NULL);
640 
641  CCmdUI state;
642  state.m_pMenu = pMenu;
643  ASSERT(state.m_pOther == NULL);
644  ASSERT(state.m_pParentMenu == NULL);
645 
646  // determine if menu is popup in top-level menu and set m_pOther to
647  // it if so (m_pParentMenu == NULL indicates that it is secondary popup)
648  HMENU hParentMenu;
649  if (AfxGetThreadState()->m_hTrackingMenu == pMenu->m_hMenu)
650  state.m_pParentMenu = pMenu; // parent == child for tracking popup
651  else if ((hParentMenu = ::GetMenu(m_hWnd)) != NULL) {
652  CWnd* pParent = GetTopLevelParent();
653  // child windows don't have menus -- need to go to the top!
654  if (pParent != NULL &&
655  (hParentMenu = ::GetMenu(pParent->m_hWnd)) != NULL) {
656  int nIndexMax = ::GetMenuItemCount(hParentMenu);
657  for (int nIndex = 0; nIndex < nIndexMax; nIndex++) {
658  if (::GetSubMenu(hParentMenu, nIndex) == pMenu->m_hMenu) {
659  // when popup is found, m_pParentMenu is containing menu
660  state.m_pParentMenu = CMenu::FromHandle(hParentMenu);
661  break;
662  }
663  }
664  }
665  }
666 
667  state.m_nIndexMax = pMenu->GetMenuItemCount();
668  for (state.m_nIndex = 0; state.m_nIndex < state.m_nIndexMax;
669  state.m_nIndex++) {
670  state.m_nID = pMenu->GetMenuItemID(state.m_nIndex);
671  if (state.m_nID == 0)
672  continue; // menu separator or invalid cmd - ignore it
673 
674  ASSERT(state.m_pOther == NULL);
675  ASSERT(state.m_pMenu != NULL);
676  if (state.m_nID == (UINT)-1) {
677  // possibly a popup menu, route to first item of that popup
678  state.m_pSubMenu = pMenu->GetSubMenu(state.m_nIndex);
679  if (state.m_pSubMenu == NULL ||
680  (state.m_nID = state.m_pSubMenu->GetMenuItemID(0)) == 0 ||
681  state.m_nID == (UINT)-1) {
682  continue; // first item of popup can't be routed to
683  }
684  state.DoUpdate(this, FALSE); // popups are never auto disabled
685  } else {
686  // normal menu item
687  // Auto enable/disable if frame window has 'm_bAutoMenuEnable'
688  // set and command is _not_ a system command.
689  state.m_pSubMenu = NULL;
690  state.DoUpdate(this, state.m_nID < 0xF000);
691  }
692 
693  // adjust for menu deletions and additions
694  UINT nCount = pMenu->GetMenuItemCount();
695  if (nCount < state.m_nIndexMax) {
696  state.m_nIndex -= (state.m_nIndexMax - nCount);
697  while (state.m_nIndex < nCount &&
698  pMenu->GetMenuItemID(state.m_nIndex) == state.m_nID) {
699  state.m_nIndex++;
700  }
701  }
702  state.m_nIndexMax = nCount;
703  }
704 }
NULL
#define NULL
Definition: getopt1.c:65

◆ OnOptionsEmulatorRewindinterval()

775 {
776  RewindInterval dlg(theApp.rewindTimer/6);
777  int v = (int)dlg.DoModal();
778 
779  if( v >= 0 ) {
780  theApp.rewindTimer = v*6; // convert to a multiple of 10 frames
781  regSetDwordValue("rewindTimer", v);
782  if(v == 0) {
783  if(theApp.rewindMemory) {
784  free(theApp.rewindMemory);
785  theApp.rewindMemory = NULL;
786  }
787  theApp.rewindCount = 0;
788  theApp.rewindCounter = 0;
789  theApp.rewindSaveNeeded = false;
790  } else {
791  if(theApp.rewindMemory == NULL) {
792  theApp.rewindMemory = (char *)malloc(8*REWIND_SIZE);
793  }
794  }
795  }
796 }

◆ OnOptionsFrameskip()

BOOL MainWnd::OnOptionsFrameskip ( UINT  nID)

MainWndOptions.cpp 파일의 158 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

159 {
160  switch(nID) {
161  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_0:
162  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_1:
163  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_2:
164  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_3:
165  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_4:
166  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_5:
167  if(theApp.cartridgeType == IMAGE_GBA) {
168  frameSkip = nID - ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_0;
169  } else {
170  gbFrameSkip = nID - ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_0;
171  }
172  if(emulating)
173  theApp.updateFrameSkip();
174  theApp.autoFrameSkip = false;
175  return TRUE;
176  break;
177  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_6:
178  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_7:
179  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_8:
180  case ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_9:
181  if(theApp.cartridgeType == IMAGE_GBA) {
182  frameSkip = 6 + nID - ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_6;
183  } else {
184  gbFrameSkip = 6 + nID - ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FRAMESKIP_6;
185  }
186  if(emulating)
187  theApp.updateFrameSkip();
188  theApp.autoFrameSkip = false;
189  return TRUE;
190  break;
191  }
192  return FALSE;
193 }

◆ OnOptionsJoypadAutofire()

BOOL MainWnd::OnOptionsJoypadAutofire ( UINT  nID)

MainWndOptions.cpp 파일의 1671 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

1672 {
1673  switch(nID) {
1674  case ID_OPTIONS_JOYPAD_AUTOFIRE_A:
1675  if(theApp.autoFire & 1) {
1676  theApp.autoFire &= ~1;
1677  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_A_DISABLED));
1678  } else {
1679  theApp.autoFire |= 1;
1680  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_A));
1681  }
1682  break;
1683  case ID_OPTIONS_JOYPAD_AUTOFIRE_B:
1684  if(theApp.autoFire & 2) {
1685  theApp.autoFire &= ~2;
1686  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_B_DISABLED));
1687  } else {
1688  theApp.autoFire |= 2;
1689  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_B));
1690  }
1691  break;
1692  case ID_OPTIONS_JOYPAD_AUTOFIRE_L:
1693  if(theApp.autoFire & 512) {
1694  theApp.autoFire &= ~512;
1695  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_L_DISABLED));
1696  } else {
1697  theApp.autoFire |= 512;
1698  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_L));
1699  }
1700  break;
1701  case ID_OPTIONS_JOYPAD_AUTOFIRE_R:
1702  if(theApp.autoFire & 256) {
1703  theApp.autoFire &= ~256;
1704  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_R_DISABLED));
1705  } else {
1706  theApp.autoFire |= 256;
1707  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_AUTOFIRE_R));
1708  }
1709  break;
1710  default:
1711  return FALSE;
1712  }
1713  return TRUE;
1714 }

◆ OnOptionsSoundStartrecording()

void MainWnd::OnOptionsSoundStartrecording ( )
protected

MainWndTools.cpp 파일의 290 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

291 {
292  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
293  CString captureBuffer;
294 
295  CString capdir = regQueryStringValue("soundRecordDir", NULL);
296 
297  if(capdir.IsEmpty())
298  capdir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
299 
300  CString filter = theApp.winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_WAV);
301  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_WAV_NAME);
302 
303  LPCTSTR exts[] = { ".WAV" };
304 
305  FileDlg dlg(this, "", filter, 1, "WAV", exts, capdir, title, true);
306 
307  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL) {
308  return;
309  }
310 
311  captureBuffer = theApp.soundRecordName = dlg.GetPathName();
312  theApp.soundRecording = true;
313 
314  if(dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset > 0) {
315  captureBuffer = captureBuffer.Left(dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset);
316  }
317 
318  int len = captureBuffer.GetLength();
319 
320  if(len > 3 && captureBuffer[len-1] == '\\')
321  captureBuffer = captureBuffer.Left(len-1);
322  regSetStringValue("soundRecordDir", captureBuffer);
323 }

◆ OnOptionsVideoFullscreen()

void MainWnd::OnOptionsVideoFullscreen ( )
protected

MainWndOptions.cpp 파일의 323 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

324 {
325  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
326  GUID *pGUID = NULL;
327  int size = theApp.display->selectFullScreenMode(&pGUID);
328  if(size != -1) {
329  int width = (size >> 12) & 4095;
330  int height = (size & 4095);
331  int colorDepth = (size >> 24);
332  if(width != theApp.fsWidth ||
333  height != theApp.fsHeight ||
334  colorDepth != theApp.fsColorDepth ||
335  pGUID != theApp.pVideoDriverGUID ||
336  theApp.videoOption != VIDEO_OTHER) {
337  theApp.fsForceChange = true;
338  theApp.fsWidth = width;
339  theApp.fsHeight = height;
340  theApp.fsColorDepth = colorDepth;
341  theApp.pVideoDriverGUID = pGUID;
342  if(pGUID) {
343  theApp.videoDriverGUID = *pGUID;
344  regSetDwordValue("defaultVideoDriver", FALSE);
345  regSetBinaryValue("videoDriverGUID",
346  (char *)pGUID, sizeof(GUID));
347  } else {
348  regSetDwordValue("defaultVideoDriver", TRUE);
349  }
350  theApp.updateVideoSize(ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FULLSCREEN);
351  theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(VBA_CONFIRM_MODE);
352  }
353  }
354  theApp.winAccelMgr.UpdateMenu(theApp.menu);
355 }
size
int size
Definition: expr-lex.cpp:1221
ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FULLSCREEN
#define ID_OPTIONS_VIDEO_FULLSCREEN
Definition: resource.h:682
NULL
#define NULL
Definition: getopt1.c:65
regSetDwordValue
void regSetDwordValue(const char *key, DWORD value, bool force)
Definition: Reg.cpp:169
pGUID
GUID * pGUID
Definition: VideoMode.cpp:50
VBA::menu
HMENU menu
Definition: VBA.h:67
VBA::videoOption
int videoOption
Definition: VBA.h:90
regSetBinaryValue

598 {
599 #ifndef NOSKINS
600  LPCTSTR exts[] = {".ini" };
601  CString filter = winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_INI);
602  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_SKIN_FILE);
603 
604  FileDlg dlg(this,
605  theApp.skinName,
606  filter,
607  0,
608  "INI",
609  exts,
610  "",
611  title,
612  false);
613 
614  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL) {
615  return;
616  }
617 
618  bool result = false;
619  if(!theApp.skinEnabled) {
620  theApp.skinEnabled = !theApp.skinEnabled;
621  regSetDwordValue("skinEnabled", theApp.skinEnabled);
622  }
623 
624  if(theApp.skin && theApp.skinEnabled) {
625  delete theApp.skin;
626  theApp.skin = NULL;
627  }
628 
629  theApp.skinName = dlg.GetPathName();
630 
631  theApp.winUpdateSkin();
632  theApp.winAccelMgr.UpdateMenu(theApp.menu);
633 #else
634  systemMessage( 0, _T("This build of VBA does not support skins!") );
635 #endif
636 }

◆ OnSize()

void MainWnd::OnSize ( UINT  nType,
int  cx,
int  cy 
)
protected

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 726 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

727 {
728  CWnd::OnSize(nType, cx, cy);
729 
730  if(!theApp.changingVideoSize) {
731  if(this) {
732  if(!IsIconic()) {
733  if(theApp.iconic) {
734  if(emulating) {
735  soundResume();
736  theApp.paused = false;
737  }
738  }
739  if(theApp.videoOption <= VIDEO_4X) {
740  theApp.surfaceSizeX = cx;
741  theApp.surfaceSizeY = cy;
742  theApp.adjustDestRect();
743  if(theApp.display)
744  theApp.display->resize(theApp.dest.right-theApp.dest.left, theApp.dest.bottom-theApp.dest.top);
745  }
746  } else {
747  if(emulating) {
748  if(!theApp.paused) {
749  theApp.paused = true;
750  soundPause();
751  }
752  }
753  theApp.iconic = true;
754  }
755  }
756  }
757 }
VBA::dest
RECT dest
Definition: VBA.h:199
VBA::adjustDestRect
void adjustDestRect()
Definition: VBA.cpp:533
IDisplay::resize
virtual void resize(int w, int h)
Definition: Display.h:41
VIDEO_4X
Definition: VBA.h:50

◆ OnToolsPlayStartmovieplaying()

void MainWnd::OnToolsPlayStartmovieplaying ( )
protected

MainWndTools.cpp 파일의 487 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

488 {
489  static bool moviePlayMessage = false;
490 
491  if(!moviePlayMessage) {
492  moviePlayMessage = true;
493  CString msg = winResLoadString(IDS_MOVIE_PLAY);
494  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_CONFIRM_ACTION);
495  if(MessageBox(msg,
496  title,
497  MB_OKCANCEL) == IDCANCEL)
498  return;
499  }
500 
501  CString captureBuffer;
502  CString capdir = regQueryStringValue("movieRecordDir", "");
503 
504  if(capdir.IsEmpty())
505  capdir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
506 
507  CString filter = theApp.winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_VMV);
508  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_MOVIE_NAME);
509 
510  LPCTSTR exts[] = { ".VMV" };
511 
512  FileDlg dlg(this, "", filter, 1, "VMV", exts, capdir, title, false);
513 
514  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL) {
515  return;
516  }
517 
518  CString movieName = dlg.GetPathName();
519  captureBuffer = movieName;
520 
521  theApp.movieFile = fopen(movieName, "rb");
522 
523  if(!theApp.movieFile) {
524  systemMessage(IDS_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, "Cannot open file %s",
525  (const char *)movieName);
526  return;
527  }
528  int version = 0;
529  fread(&version, 1, sizeof(int), theApp.movieFile);
530  if(version != 1) {
531  systemMessage(IDS_UNSUPPORTED_MOVIE_VERSION,
532  "Unsupported movie version %d.",
533  version);
534  fclose(theApp.movieFile);
535  theApp.movieFile = NULL;
536  return;
537  }
538  movieName = movieName.Left(movieName.GetLength()-3)+"VM0";
539  if(loadSaveGame(movieName)) {
540  theApp.moviePlaying = true;
541  theApp.movieFrame = 0;
542  theApp.moviePlayFrame = 0;
543  theApp.movieLastJoypad = 0;
544  theApp.movieReadNext();
545  } else {
546  systemMessage(IDS_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, "Cannot open file %s",
547  (const char *)movieName);
548  }
549 }

CString winLoadFilter(UINT id)

◆ OnToolsRecordStartavirecording()

void MainWnd::OnToolsRecordStartavirecording ( )

MainWndTools.cpp 파일의 344 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

345 {
346  theApp.winCheckFullscreen();
347  CString captureBuffer;
348 
349  CString capdir = regQueryStringValue("aviRecordDir", NULL);
350 
351  if(capdir.IsEmpty())
352  capdir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
353 
354  CString filter = theApp.winLoadFilter(IDS_FILTER_AVI);
355  CString title = winResLoadString(IDS_SELECT_AVI_NAME);
356 
357  LPCTSTR exts[] = { ".AVI" };
358 
359  FileDlg dlg(this, "", filter, 1, "AVI", exts, capdir, title, true);
360 
361  if(dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL) {
362  return;
363  }
364 
365  captureBuffer = theApp.soundRecordName = dlg.GetPathName();
366  theApp.aviRecordName = captureBuffer;
367  theApp.aviRecording = true;
368 
369  if(dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset > 0) {
370  captureBuffer = captureBuffer.Left(dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset);
371  }
372 
373  int len = captureBuffer.GetLength();
374 
375  if(len > 3 && captureBuffer[len-1] == '\\')
376  captureBuffer = captureBuffer.Left(len-1);
377 
378  regSetStringValue("aviRecordDir", captureBuffer);
379 }

422  captureBuffer = movieName;
423 
424  if(dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset > 0) {
425  captureBuffer = captureBuffer.Left(dlg.m_ofn.nFileOffset);
426  }
427 
428  int len = captureBuffer.GetLength();
429 
430  if(len > 3 && captureBuffer[len-1] == '\\')
431  captureBuffer = captureBuffer.Left(len-1);
432 
433  regSetStringValue("movieRecordDir", captureBuffer);
434 
435  theApp.movieFile = fopen(movieName, "wb");
436 
437  if(!theApp.movieFile) {
438  systemMessage(IDS_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, "Cannot open file %s",
439  (const char *)movieName);
440  return;
441  }
442 
443  int version = 1;
444 
445  fwrite(&version, 1, sizeof(int), theApp.movieFile);
446 
447  movieName = movieName.Left(movieName.GetLength()-3) + "VM0";
448 
449  if(writeSaveGame(movieName)) {
450  theApp.movieFrame = 0;
451  theApp.movieLastJoypad = 0;
452  theApp.movieRecording = true;
453  theApp.moviePlaying = false;
454  } else {
455  systemMessage(IDS_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, "Cannot open file %s",
456  (const char *)movieName);
457  }
458 }

◆ OnUpdateFileLoadgameMostrecent()

void MainWnd::OnUpdateFileLoadgameMostrecent ( CCmdUI *  pCmdUI)
protected

MainWndFile.cpp 파일의 934 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

935 {
936  pCmdUI->Enable(emulating);
937 
938  if(pCmdUI->m_pSubMenu != NULL) {
939  CMenu *pMenu = pCmdUI->m_pSubMenu;
940  CString filename;
941 
942  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
943 
944  if(index != -1)
945  filename = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
946  else
947  filename = theApp.filename;
948 
949  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
950  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
951  // handle as relative path
952  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
953  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
954  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
955  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
956  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
957  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
958  saveDir = baseDir;
959  }
960 
961  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
962  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
963 
964  if(!isDriveRoot(saveDir))
965  saveDir += "\\";
966 
967  CString name;
968  CFileStatus status;
969  CString str;
970 
971  for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
972  name.Format("%s%s%d.sgm", saveDir, filename, i+1);
973 
974  if(emulating && CFile::GetStatus(name, status)) {
975  CString timestamp = status.m_mtime.Format("%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S");
976  str.Format("%d %s", i+1, timestamp);
977  } else {
978  str.Format("%d ----/--/-- --:--:--", i+1);
979  }
980  pMenu->ModifyMenu(ID_FILE_LOADGAME_SLOT1+i, MF_STRING|MF_BYCOMMAND, ID_FILE_LOADGAME_SLOT1+i, str);
981  }
982 
983  theApp.winAccelMgr.UpdateMenu(pMenu->GetSafeHmenu());
984  }
985 }

86 {
87  pCmdUI->SetCheck(theApp.recentFreeze);
88 
89  if(pCmdUI->m_pMenu == NULL)
90  return;
91 
92  CMenu *pMenu = pCmdUI->m_pMenu;
93 
94  int i;
95  for(i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
96  if(!pMenu->RemoveMenu(ID_FILE_MRU_FILE1+i, MF_BYCOMMAND))
97  break;
98  }
99 
100  for(i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
101  CString p = theApp.recentFiles[i];
102  if(p.GetLength() == 0)
103  break;
104  int index = p.ReverseFind('\\');
105 
106  if(index != -1)
107  p = p.Right(p.GetLength()-index-1);
108 
109  pMenu->AppendMenu(MF_STRING, ID_FILE_MRU_FILE1+i, p);
110  }
111  theApp.winAccelMgr.UpdateMenu((HMENU)*pMenu);
112 }

832  if(pCmdUI->m_pSubMenu != NULL) {
833  CMenu *pMenu = pCmdUI->m_pSubMenu;
834  CString filename;
835 
836  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');

838  if(index != -1)
839  filename = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
840  else
841  filename = theApp.filename;
842 
843  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
844  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
845  // handle as relative path
846  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
847  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
848  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
849  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
850  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
851  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
852  saveDir = baseDir;
853  }

◆ readBatteryFile()

void MainWnd::readBatteryFile ( )

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 909 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

910 {
911  CString buffer;
912  CString filename;
913 
914  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
915 
916  if(index != -1)
917  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
918  else
919  buffer = theApp.filename;
920 
921  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("batteryDir", NULL);
922  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
923  // handle as relative path
924  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
925  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
926  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
927  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
928  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
929  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
930  saveDir = baseDir;
931  }
932 
933  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
934  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
935 
936  if(isDriveRoot(saveDir))
937  filename.Format("%s%s.sav", saveDir, buffer);
938  else
939  filename.Format("%s\\%s.sav", saveDir, buffer);
940 
941  bool res = false;
942 
943  if(theApp.emulator.emuReadBattery)
944  res = theApp.emulator.emuReadBattery(filename);
945 
946  if(res)
947  systemScreenMessage(winResLoadString(IDS_LOADED_BATTERY));
948 }
systemScreenMessage
void systemScreenMessage(const char *_csMsg)

◆ screenCapture()

void MainWnd::screenCapture ( int  captureNumber)

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 1121 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

1122 {
1123  CString buffer;
1124 
1125  CString captureDir = regQueryStringValue("captureDir", "");
1126  if( captureDir[0] == '.' ) {
1127  // handle as relative path
1128  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
1129  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
1130  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
1131  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
1132  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
1133  strcat( baseDir, captureDir );
1134  captureDir = baseDir;
1135  }
1136  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
1137 
1138  CString name;
1139  if(index != -1)
1140  name = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
1141  else
1142  name = theApp.filename;
1143 
1144  if(captureDir.IsEmpty())
1145  captureDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
1146 
1147  LPCTSTR ext = "png";
1148  if(theApp.captureFormat != 0)
1149  ext = "bmp";
1150 
1151  if(isDriveRoot(captureDir))
1152  buffer.Format("%s%s_%02d.%s",
1153  captureDir,
1154  name,
1155  captureNumber,
1156  ext);
1157  else
1158  buffer.Format("%s\\%s_%02d.%s",
1159  captureDir,
1160  name,
1161  captureNumber,
1162  ext);
1163 
1164  // check if file exists
1165  DWORD dwAttr = GetFileAttributes( buffer );
1166  if( dwAttr != INVALID_FILE_ATTRIBUTES ) {
1167  // screenshot file already exists
1168  screenCapture(++captureNumber);
1169  // this will recursively use the first non-existent screenshot number
1170  return;
1171  }
1172 
1173  if(theApp.captureFormat == 0)
1174  theApp.emulator.emuWritePNG(buffer);
1175  else
1176  theApp.emulator.emuWriteBMP(buffer);
1177 
1178  CString msg = winResLoadString(IDS_SCREEN_CAPTURE);
1179  systemScreenMessage(msg);
1180 }
systemScreenMessage
void systemScreenMessage(const char *_csMsg)

◆ updateSoundChannels()

1141 {
1142  int flag = 0;
1143 
1144  if(id == ID_OPTIONS_SOUND_CHANNEL1)
1145  flag = 1;
1146 
1147  if(id == ID_OPTIONS_SOUND_CHANNEL2)
1148  flag = 2;
1149 
1150  if(id == ID_OPTIONS_SOUND_CHANNEL3)
1151  flag = 4;
1152 
1153  if(id == ID_OPTIONS_SOUND_CHANNEL4)
1154  flag = 8;
1155 
1156  if(id == ID_OPTIONS_SOUND_DIRECTSOUNDA)
1157  flag = 256;
1158 
1159  if(id == ID_OPTIONS_SOUND_DIRECTSOUNDB)
1160  flag = 512;
1161 
1162  int active = soundGetEnable() & 0x30f;
1163 
1164  if(active & flag)
1165  active &= (~flag);
1166  else
1167  active |= flag;
1168 
1169  soundEnable(active);
1170  soundDisable((~active)&0x30f);
1171 }

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 759 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

760 {
761  CString name;
762  CString filename;
763 
764  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
765 
766  if(index != -1)
767  name = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
768  else
769  name = theApp.filename;
770  CString dir = regQueryStringValue("saveDir", NULL);
771  if( dir[0] == '.' ) {
772  // handle as relative path
773  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
774  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
775  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
776  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
777  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
778  strcat( baseDir, dir );
779  dir = baseDir;
780  }
781 
782  if(!dir.GetLength())
783  dir = getDirFromFile(filename);
784 
785  if(isDriveRoot(dir))
786  filename.Format("%s%s.clt", dir, name);
787  else
788  filename.Format("%s\\%s.clt", dir, name);
789 
790  winSaveCheatList(filename);
791 }

◆ writeBatteryFile()

void MainWnd::writeBatteryFile ( )

MainWnd.cpp 파일의 872 번째 라인에서 정의되었습니다.

873 {
874  CString buffer;
875  CString filename;
876 
877  int index = theApp.filename.ReverseFind('\\');
878 
879  if(index != -1)
880  buffer = theApp.filename.Right(theApp.filename.GetLength()-index-1);
881  else
882  buffer = theApp.filename;
883 
884  CString saveDir = regQueryStringValue("batteryDir", NULL);
885  if( saveDir[0] == '.' ) {
886  // handle as relative path
887  char baseDir[MAX_PATH+1];
888  GetModuleFileName( NULL, baseDir, MAX_PATH );
889  baseDir[MAX_PATH] = '\0'; // for security reasons
890  PathRemoveFileSpec( baseDir ); // removes the trailing file name and backslash
891  strcat( baseDir, "\\" );
892  strcat( baseDir, saveDir );
893  saveDir = baseDir;
894  }
895 
896  if(saveDir.IsEmpty())
897  saveDir = getDirFromFile(theApp.filename);
898 
899  if(isDriveRoot(saveDir))
900  filename.Format("%s%s.sav", saveDir, buffer);
901  else
902  filename.Format("%s\\%s.sav", saveDir, buffer);
903 
904  if(theApp.emulator.emuWriteBattery)
905  theApp.emulator.emuWriteBattery(filename);
906 }
